title: (x) Metro newspaper headline font??? - FF Unit Slab {Reed}
content:
Hi!

does anyone know what font is used in the headlines of the re-designed Metro newspaper?

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110032736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/metro_4202.jpg)
author: teotuominen

comments.content: [FF Unit Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110032736/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_unit_slab_pro_collection). A bit more info on the _Metro_ redesign [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110032736/http:/www.visualeditors.com/apple/2009/09/metro-tabs-in-boston-philly-and-nyc-launch-redesign)
